parsed.recap:
DEV: Lisle village obliterated when Rance's latent Mage-Gift violently awakened during bandit attack; villagers carried off; Rance collapsed in crater; Senta found and Chose him; evidence discovered—bandits wore hidden red robes, fled toward Menmellith; traveling to Waystation en route to Haven.

PEND: Red-robed organization's purpose; Rance's uncontrolled Gift; fate of captured villagers; whether attackers will return.
